main event: A civilian in Rockford observed a silverish white object the size of a golf ball for 10 minutes in October 1958.
interesting points: The object was stationary during the entire observation., The object was described as silverish white and golf ball-sized., The sighting was conducted from the ground with clear visibility., The report suggests the object was likely a balloon., It was noted that there was no sound from the object during the sighting.
sighted object: silverish white object the size of a golf ball
